availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jonah J. Tichenor (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Tichenor. Farmer and student in Nelson County in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Nelson County in 1860. Household owned one additional enslaved person in Nelson County in 1860. Farmer in Nelson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 291A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 211.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 24, p. 28 of 47 of microfilm.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Fairfield, p. 130B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Nelson County, KY, 1863, p. 489 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1965), KDLA,Film 7016135: All Counties, Jefferson County 1911, File #18529, p. 1934 of 3310 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, “Jonah Tichenor (unknown-1912)," Memorial # 137247496, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/137247496/jonah-tichenor (accessed November 30, 2020).
